name: Skate King
description: 2D Game about a Skater. The power of your pressing the button - power of skater's jumping. You will see a lot of difficult moving and static obstacles. There is no movement in the air, it's make this game really difficult. You should have a really good sensitivity to pass all the levels. Only true god gamers can complete this game! This game was created by PyGame(Python). #platformer #skate #skater #arcade #action #jump #jumping #parkour #python #pygame
